Home.pre: Ink, the Ethereum L2 unleashed by Kraken, is live on the Superchain
Home.title: Ink the future

Community.title: Join the Ink Community
Community.description: Discover, dive into events, and get the support you need to ink the future with us

letsGetSocial.title: Let's get social
letsGetSocial.description: Join the Ink community, vibe with fellow developers and get support

twitter.title: Follow us on X
twitter.description: Stay tuned to receive all ink updates first hand

discord.title: Join our Discord
discord.description: Access our Discord for fast support, feedback and memes

telegram.title: Talk to us on Telegram
telegram.description: Get exclusive updates and inside tips from our team and users

farcaster.title: Follow us on Farcaster
farcaster.description: Connect with us where the real DeFi conversations happen

brandKit.title: Brand Kit
brandKit.description: Ink logos, colors, typefaces, illustrations, and best practices. It should help any and all creative work

Verify.title: Verify your Kraken account onchain
Verify.description: Securely connect your Kraken account with your wallet to start unlocking the Ink ecosystem.

verifications.title: Verifications
verifications.description: Verify your onchain activity across multiple networks

whatIsVerify.title: What is Kraken Verify?
whatIsVerify.description: Kraken Verify allows you to verify that your wallet address is associated with your Kraken account by making an onchain attestation. By verifying, you can begin to access exclusive features across Ink.

whyVerify.title: What partners or dApps support Kraken Verify?
whyVerify.description: We're actively onboarding partners! GM will be the first to support onchain verification based features.

whatGoesOnchain.title: What goes onchain?
whatGoesOnchain.description: We only store your wallet address and a confirmation that it's been verified - nothing more.

payforGas.title: Do I have to pay for gas?
payforGas.description: No! We cover the gas fees for you.

numberofAddresses.title: How many addresses can I verify?
numberofAddresses.description: You can verify one address at a time. Changing addresses is easy, simply revoke and re-verify with a new address.

howDoesitWork.title: How does it work?
howDoesitWork.description: Kraken Verify uses the <eas-link>Ethereum Attestation Service (EAS)</eas-link> on Ink to issue onchain attestations. EAS is a standard protocol for making trusted claims about onchain or offchain data â€” stored securely onchain.

wherecaniView.title: Where can I view my onchain verification?
wherecaniView.description: When you verify, a notification will appear that links you to the transaction tied to your attestation.

wrongAddress.title: I connected the wrong wallet, what should I do?
wrongAddress.description: Revoke the verification and verify again with the correct address.

support.title: Where can I get support?
support.description: If you have any questions or concerns, please reach out to us via Kraken support channels.

devSupport.title: I'm a developer and I want to integrate, how do I get started?
devSupport.description: To integrate with Kraken Verify, check out our documentation here: https://docs.inkonchain.com/build/verify

step1.title: Connect your wallet
step1.description: Choose the wallet you want to verify to begin the process

step2.title: Sign a verification request
step2.description: Confirm ownership of your wallet by signing a message

step3.title: Sign in to your Kraken account
step3.description: Confirm ownership of your Kraken account by signing in

step4.title: Successfully verified
step4.description: Your wallet now reflects the fact that you have a Kraken account

success.title: Successfully verified
success.description: Your Kraken account is now associated with your wallet onchain

revoke.title: Verification successfully revoked
revoke.description: Your Kraken account is not associated with your wallet onchain

perks.title: Kraken Verify Partners
perks.description: Explore our ecosystem partners who use Kraken Verify.

About.title: What is Ink?
About.description: Ink is an Ethereum layer 2 blockchain, built on the OP Stack, designed to be the house of DeFi for the Superchain. Ink will empower onchain builders to deploy new and innovative DeFi protocols for the next billion users onchain.

Builders.title: Start building on Ink
Builders.description: Our commitment to builders: Ink will provide you with a world class development environment, complete with the tools, support, and users you need to bring your ideas to life.

applyForGrant.title: Apply for Grant
applyForGrant.description: Do you have an amazing project you want to deploy on Ink? Apply to receive a grant!

applyForRetroGrant.title: Apply for Retro Grant
applyForRetroGrant.description: Saw something amazing deployed on Ink? Submit a project, team, or builder for a retroactive grant.

ethdenver.title: Join us at the House of Ink in Denver
ethdenver.description: Join us at the House of Ink, a 5-day immersive hacker house experience during ETH Denver, where innovation meets collaboration! Explore the power of Ink, dive into smart contract development, and gain hands-on expertise through interactive workshops and tooling overviews.
